doc:
Hugh Miller (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hugh_Miller_(actor) 0 Hugh Miller (22 May 1889 – 1976) was a British stage and film actor. He was instrumental in founding the original London Film Society in 1925, but left soon afterwards to work in America. He found success on Broadway, as Mr. Jingle in Pickwick in 1927; and in Hollywood, in the Gloria Swanson film The Love of Sunya, that same year. Hugh_Miller ( 22_May_1889 – 1976 ) was a_British_stage_and_film_actor . He was instrumental in founding the_original_London_Film_Society in 1925 , but left_soon afterwards to_work in America . He found success on Broadway , as Mr._Jingle in Pickwick in 1927 ; and in Hollywood , in the_Gloria_Swanson_film The_Love of Sunya , that_same_year .
